in.newshub.org/2015/04/ajax-amsterdam-de.snippet: Amsterdam delay Dutch league coronation of PSV after 2-0...: Champions Ajax Amsterdam stayed in the Dutch league title race for at least another week as they won 2-0 away at Heracles Almelo on Saturday and delayed the coronation of PSV Eindhoven.
